prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has elegant, flowing features and a beautiful singing voice.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the ocean with vibrant blue and white colors.
Imagine a water/fairy hybrid Pokemon with a graceful body and enchanting aquatic abilities.
Generate a Pokemon with a mermaid-like appearance, featuring unique aquatic elements and a serene aura.
Show me a Pokemon that captures the essence of a sea creature, with flowing fins and mesmerizing colors.
Make a mystical water-type Pokemon that has a strong connection to the sea and nature.
Give me an image of a fairy-like Pokemon with bubbles and musical elements, inspired by ocean life.
